## Web3sdkioNftMedia variable

This component can be used to render NFTs from the web3sdkio SDK. Props: [Web3sdkioNftMediaProps](./react.web3sdkionftmediaprops.md)

## Example

```jsx
import { Web3sdkioNftMedia, useContract, useNFT } from "@web3sdkio/react";
export default function NFTCollectionRender() {
  const { contract } = useContract(<your-contract-address>);
  const { data: nft, isLoading } = useNFT(contract, 0);

  return (
    <div>
      {!isLoading && nft ? (
        <Web3sdkioNftMedia metadata={nft.metadata} />
      ) : (
        <p>Loading...</p>
      )}
    </div>
  );
}
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
Web3sdkioNftMedia: React.ForwardRefExoticComponent<
  Web3sdkioNftMediaProps & React.RefAttributes<HTMLMediaElement>
>;
```
